English:
Dive into the world of hydrology, meteorology, and water chemistry with the Yukon Department of Environment's Water Resources Branch.

Our mission? To bring data to your fingertips, aligning with the Open Government initiative for transparency, citizen empowerment, and sparking research creativity. Explore our historic and real-time data, made available under the terms of our limitation of liability.

Au sujet de l'organization de nos donn√©es

English:
We classify data as discrete or continuous. The classification depends on:
  • measurement frequency
  • how the measurement was made
  • other relevant metadata

    • What is discrete data?
    Discrete data are snapshot observations collected manually (e.g. snow depth) or by laboratory analysis. This data must have a description of how it was acquired, the analysis method, etc.

    What is continuous data?
    Continuous data is collected at regular, frequent intervals (e.g. hourly), mostly using automated instruments. Metadata include the instrument type and recording conditions.
Fran√ßais:
Nous classifions les donn√©es en discr√®tes ou continues. Cette classification d√©pend de :
  • la fr√©quence des mesures
  • la m√©thode de mesure
  • autres m√©tadonn√©es pertinentes

    • Qu‚Äôest-ce que les donn√©es discr√®tes ?
    Les donn√©es discr√®tes sont des observations ponctuelles recueillies manuellement (p. ex. profondeur de neige) ou par analyse en laboratoire. Ces donn√©es doivent comporter une description de leur acquisition, de la m√©thode d‚Äôanalyse, etc.

    Qu‚Äôest-ce que les donn√©es continues ?
    Les donn√©es continues sont collect√©es √† intervalles r√©guliers et fr√©quents (p. ex. horaire), principalement √† l‚Äôaide d‚Äôinstruments automatis√©s. Les m√©tadonn√©es incluent le type d‚Äôinstrument et les conditions d‚Äôenregistrement.

English: This function is intended to facilitate the reporting of hydrology data by compiling basic statistics (years of record, months of operation, min, max, etc.), trend information (Mann-Kendall direction and p-value, Sen's slope), and creating simple plots of level (for lakes) or flow for all requested locations. Please note that this isn't exactly a polished output, and is to be used strictly for informational purposes. In particular, note that very little of the data underlying the trends calculated has been cleaned or certified as correct by a human.
Fran√ßais: Cette fonction est con√ßue pour faciliter le rapport des donn√©es hydrologiques en compilant des statistiques de base (ann√©es de relev√©s, mois d‚Äôexploitation, minimum, maximum, etc.), des informations sur les tendances (direction de Mann-Kendall et valeur-p, pente de Sen) et en g√©n√©rant des graphiques simples du niveau (pour les lacs) ou du d√©bit pour tous les emplacements demand√©s. Veuillez noter qu‚Äôil ne s‚Äôagit pas d‚Äôun r√©sultat finalis√©, mais d‚Äôun outil strictement destin√© √† des fins informatives. En particulier, il convient de souligner que tr√®s peu des donn√©es sous-jacentes aux tendances calcul√©es ont √©t√© nettoy√©es ou certifi√©es comme correctes par un humain.
